Name: Progress
Description: Displays an indicator showing the completion progress of a task, typically displayed as a progress bar.

SubComponents.Name: Root
SubComponents.Description: Contains all of the progress parts.

Props.Name: asChild
Props.Description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.  Read our Composition guide for more details.

Props.Name: getValueLabel
Props.Description: A function to get the accessible label text representing the current value in a human-readable format. If not provided, the value label will be read as the numeric value as a percentage of the max value.

SubComponents.Name: Indicator
SubComponents.Description: Used to show the progress visually. It also makes progress accessible to assistive technologies.

Props.Name: asChild
Props.Description: A function to get the accessible label text representing the current value in a human-readable format. If not provided, the value label will be read as the numeric value as a percentage of the max value.
